Text.val: 16.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
24.09.2002 JJ Changed results DB sql sum tasks to QTEMP
23.09.2002 JJ Fixed fetching of mark codelimit exceeded
Program checks DEBB against sums in INVA

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast (sum(inva_actafactoring + inva_actaspecial) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actafactoring) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaretention) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actadisputes) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaspecial) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaextrafin) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/inva inner join :1/invo on invo_no = inva_no and invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_aactuali<>0 where inva_currency= ':3' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast (sum(inva_actaspecial) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/inva inner join :1/invo on invo_no = inva_no and invo_debc_no = :2 and invo_aactuali<>0 and invo_markcodespec = :3 where inva_currency = ':4' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
